div.head: INTRODUCTION
div.p: The PREMIS Data Dictionary is a comprehensive, practical resource for implementing preservation metadata in digital preservation systems. The Data Dictionary defines preservation metadata that

list.item: Supports the viability, renderability, understandability, authenticity, and identity of digital objects in a preservation context;
Emphasizes “implementable metadata ”: rigorously defined, supported by guidelines for creation, management, and use, and oriented toward automated workflows; and,
Embodies technical neutrality: no assumptions made about pres ervation technologies, strategies, metadata storage and management, etc
